source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 803,976 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 305,973.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,290, up to 11,451.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.6 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call an earthen ally to your aid, supporting you in combat.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
